features: POWERFUL PERFORMANCE: Effortlessly Tackle Any Task with the Powerful 13th Gen Intel Core i5 Processor and 16GB DDR4 Memory.
LIMITLESS PRODUCTIVITY: Break boundaries with the versatile new Inspiron Compact Desktop.
SEAMLESS CONNECTION: Experience the next level of connectivity with New WiFi 6, which offers faster speeds, stability and range. Eliminate the frustration of waiting for a stable connection.
IMMERSIVE VISUALS EXPERIENCE: Expand your workspace by connecting up to three FHD monitors or one 4K monitor via the rear HDMI and Display Port connectors.
PREMIUM SERVICES: Premium Support with SupportAssist, the smart technology that keeps your PC performing at its best.
body.description: Experience the Dell Inspiron 3020S Desktop with powerful performance and seamless multitasking. Equipped with an Intel Core i5-13400 processor and 16GB DDR4 RAM, this desktop delivers exceptional speed and responsiveness for both work and entertainment. The combination of a 512GB SSD and 1TB HDD provides ample storage space, allowing you to store all your files, documents, and media with ease. Enjoy smooth graphics and vibrant visuals with the integrated Intel UHD 730 Graphics, perfect for casual gaming and multimedia activities. The desktop comes pre-installed with Windows 11 Home, offering a user-friendly interface and a host of innovative features to enhance your computing experience. In addition to its powerful performance, the Dell Inspiron 3020S Desktop boasts a sleek and compact design that fits seamlessly into any workspace. Its stylish aesthetic blends well with any environment, adding a touch of sophistication to your setup. Upgrade your computing experience with the Dell Inspiron 3020S Desktop. With its powerful hardware, ample storage, integrated graphics, and Windows 11 Home, it offers the perfect balance of performance and versatility. Get ready to accomplish tasks with ease and enjoy a seamless computing experience with this reliable desktop. Dell Services are included with this product, providing you with comprehensive support and assistance whenever you need it. Whether it's troubleshooting, software installations, or hardware upgrades, Dell has got you covered. Enjoy peace of mind knowing that you have a reliable partner backing your technological endeavors. The Dell Inspiron 3020S Desktop comes with 1 year of Premium Support, ensuring peace of mind and exceptional customer service. Should you require assistance, Dell's expert support team is ready to assist you. Dell Migrate is the simple do-it-yourself tool that moves your hard to replace data, personal records and important files to your latest Dell PC (Windows 8 or higher. Excludes Mac OS, Google Chrome OS, Steam OS).

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Inspiron Compact Desktop Featuring the latest 13th Gen Intel Core processors and expandability, there are no limits to what you can do with the new Inspiron Compact Desktop. 13th Gen Intel Core i5-13400 processor (10-Core, 20MB Cache, 2.5GHz to 4.6GHz)Intel UHD Graphics 730 with shared graphics memory512GB M.2 PCIe NVMe Solid State Drive + 1TB 7200RPM Hard Drive Storage16GB, 1 x 16 GB, DDR4, 3200 MHz Memory Windows 11 brings you closer to what you love Family, friends, obsessions, music, creations Windows 11 is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever’s next.
Great possibilities. Small footprint Bigger doesn't always mean better. The Inspiron Small Desktop comes with the latest 13th Gen Intel Core Processors and 16GB DDR4 memory, all in a compact design.
Designed to fit your life The Inspiron Small Desktop packs great performance features and capabilities into a small chassis designed to seamlessly fit in any space.

Ready to perform Effortlessly tackle any task with the power of 13th Gen Intel Core Processors and 16GB DDR4 memory. For easy access and storage of all files, photos and videos, the Inspiron Small Desktop has an Hybrid storage. Connect conveniently Easily connect to other monitors with HDMI and Display Ports that support three FHD monitors or one 4K monitor. When time is of the essence, Wi-Fi 6 delivers a greater and more stable browsing experience and faster transfer speeds. HDMI 1.4 (Maximum resolution supported over HDMI is 1920x1200 @60Hz. No 4K/2K output). Display Port can support 1 UHD or 3 FHD monitors if displays are equipped with Daisy chain functionality. WiFi 6/WiFi 6E compatible router required. Router requires separate purchase.

Ports and Slots 1. Power Button | 2. Media Card Reader | 3. Global Headset Jack | 4. 2 x USB 2.0 Type A | 5. 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A | 6. Line-out | 7. HDMI 1.4b | 8. Display Port | 9. 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A | 10. 2 x USB 2.0 | 11. Expansion Slots | 12. Power Supply | 13. Power Supply Diagnostics Button | 14. Kensington Lock Slot | 15. RJ45 | 16. Padlock Loop HDMI 1.4 (Maximum resolution supported over HDMI is 1920x1200 @60Hz. No 4K/2K output). Display Port can support 1 UHD or 3 FHD monitors if displays are equipped with Daisy chain functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very solid non-gaming computer!
reviews.reviewText: We got this for my Aunt for Christmas. This computer is a LOT of computer for the price. A top of the line i7 processor, Fast SSD drive, 16Gb of RAM and plenty of connections, it is a very high performance computer for under $999 at this point and time. The only thing it lacks is a high end graphics card for 3d gaming, which my Aunt did not need. Honestly, this was more computer than she needed, but we wanted to give her a premier experience and also wanted to keep her from having to update any time soon. She had her last computer for over 10 years, so this one should last her nearly that long as well, based on its current specs and her use-case.For anything but high-intensive graphics processing, this is pretty much as much computer as most people ever need for stuff like internet surfing, e-mail, word processing and videos and such. It’s good quality, and it is working great. We paired it with a nice 27 inch Samsung monitor and it is a beast. It also comes with a mouse and a chicklet keyboard, which is up to you to keep or change. But they are perfectly functional and work fine unless you need something more.A solid five stars for what it is!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonder desktop with a small footprint
reviews.reviewText: Super fast processor. Fits under my desk in a very small footprint. Lots of ports to tie into for accessories.Great computer for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact PC
reviews.reviewText: So far so good. Dell should have included the connecting cable for the monitor, since it does not have the usual connection port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great to have
reviews.reviewText: This is a new system for a base setup im coming off of a I5-3330 Dell-Inspiron 660 16GB Ram 1050TI upgraded for future gaming as games were becoming harder and harder to play at max settings its also my 1st look into having a NVME SSD i took out the HDD 1TB and replaced it with my 4TB HDD for storage also over written the NVME cause windows 11 was ewww in my view XP and windows 10 are the best 2 OS systems in world history in my view next ill be looking to save up for a higher NVME SSD that has more space then what this unit came with its speed is wonderful as for the future ill have HDD for backup as i let the main part of the system run thru the NVME SSD atm i can only hold a few games but will invest in a larger component soon enough it also came with a wonderful RTX 3060 12GB which is marvelous i currently tried all my games i own and nothing i own doesn't run good on its maximum settings

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Came quickly, easy to set-up and very fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Slow to wake from sleep
reviews.reviewText: This computer is stable and fast enough for my needs, but it might be the slowest I have ever experienced when waking up. I never know whether I need to reboot or take a nap... 😂. But it was affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent upgrade for Windows 11. Good price.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this brand new machine so I can upgrade to Windows 11. A few hitches getting some ham radio specific software to load. Only problem is the video flickers and seems to shrink then recover when using Edge for web browsing. Usually does it twice close to when the app starts, then it is stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great upgrade for my son
reviews.reviewText: I purchased for my son to upgrade his gaming computer. He plays Minecraft and Roblox. He noticed a great improvement compared to his old computer. The keyboard and mouse response is much quicker. I paired this computer with a new 32" monitor. Together a huge improvement over his previous gaming setup.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very fast. Loaded all my programs
reviews.reviewText: I liked its speed. It took my programs well and because of One Drive brought up all my documents. Did not automatically run Co-pilot which I was happy about as I find Co-pilot annoying at best. Dell is quite helpful.

reviews.reviewerName: Married, Father of 4, Financial Services Professional, Ordained Minister
reviews.reviewTitle: Excellant replacement to my 'state of the art' computer from 2017 oops a different manufacturer.
reviews.reviewText: The Dell out-of-the-box functionality and its versatility handling my large collection of digital books, music, video and photgrpahs is excellant. I used the MyDell to that runs scans and identify fixes (update drivers) that is very easy to use. The tools Dell provide will make my life easier. Nice to come back to Dell after buying a number of PC's over decades and straying outside in 2017.
